TopicTitle: Game Crashing at Loading or Entering a Depot.

Articles.Content:
So yeah... I hope this explains enough;

Everytime running the game, it either:

1.) Crashes during loading my saved mission

2.) Crashes (after a succesfull load) when entering a building (depot, hangar, tracking station..)

Now, at option 2, the space center is located above the sea...

Any ideas on how to fix this?

The space center is above the sea? Can I have a picture of this?

Can you give more detail? Did you install any mods before this problem?

Try running the Patcher. That *might* help.

My 200th post!

Edited December 12, 2014 by Engineer Of Stuff
I'd recommend first updating your graphics card drivers. If that doesn't fix it, we'll need to see the output log as well as your settings.cfg file.

Here you go....

I re-installed it; works. But then when turning it on again it gets this again and gets unable to play.

The error report states this;

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.5.2f1_9abb1b59b47c]

KSP.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)

in module KSP.exe at 001b:0027bf96.

Error occurred at 2014-12-14_211622.

D:\Program Files\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe, run by Desley.

96% memory in use.

3328 MB physical memory [110 MB free].

0 MB paging file [2010 MB free].

2048 MB user address space [60 MB free].

Read from location 00000004 caused an access violation.

Context:

EDI: 0x00000004 ESI: 0x17117390 EAX: 0x02520dc4

EBX: 0x00e2f3cc ECX: 0x703f0028 EDX: 0x705f0028

EIP: 0x0027bf96 EBP: 0x00e2f3b4 SegCs: 0x0000001b

EFlags: 0x00210202 ESP: 0x00e2f390 SegSs: 0x00000023

Bytes at CS:EIP:

8b 1f 89 77 fc 8b 46 08 81 e3 00 00 00 c0 c1 e8

Im 100% sure it isnt the memory, because normally it works fine.
Not that log file. We need the output_log.txt file. If you can't find it in the crash folder, look in KSP_Data.
How to add that here as a downloadable file?
Drop it somewhere like mediafire, google docs, or dropbox. Then post the link here.
Nevermind. 0.90.0 fixed the bug, no longer happens to me that often
